shortdesc.ph: Sets the list of user IDs whose video streams you do not want to subscribe to.
Sets the blocklist for video stream subscription.

p.codeblock: virtual int setSubscribeVideoBlocklistEx(uid_t* uidList, int uidNumber, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int setSubscribeVideoBlocklistEx(int[] uidList, RtcConnection connection);

ul.li: You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The blocklist is not affected by the , , or autoSubscribeAudio settings in .
Once the blocklist is set, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is added to both the allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The blocklist setting is not affected by , , or the autoSubscribeVideo setting in .
Once the blocklist is set, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is added to both the allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: This method applies to multi-channel scenarios.

plentry.pd: The list of user IDs whose video streams you do not want to subscribe to. To remove a user from the blocklist, call to update the list and include only the user IDs you still want to block.
The number of user IDs in the list.

The list of remote user IDs whose video streams you do not want to subscribe to. To unsubscribe from a user's video stream, add the user's ID to this list. To remove a user from the blocklist, call the method to update the list, including only the user IDs you do not want to subscribe to.
